title: Secret Desire
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>It’s been a while since Ai has been in Harajuku~! Where do you want to go, Kanan? Ai will show you around~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Everywhere seems fun, so I’ll go wherever you want to go, Ai-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh, since you came all this way, don’t you have something you want to do or try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Want to try.... huh. It’s not that I don’t but, if you’re asking me what I really want to try, then.... I just can’t seem to make up my mind about it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What is it? It’s not like you to be indecisive like that, Kanan. Tell me-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You know how you did gyaru style makeup on Nozomi sometime ago, Ai-chan? I kind of want to try an image change or appearance like that once<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oooh! That’s my specialty! Then let’s go to this secondhand clothing store that Ai knows. They have a wide assortment of foreign clothes, and they’re also cheap and cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I want to go there! I also want to try wearing something I didn’t pick out for myself, so.... Umm, could you pick some for me, Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright! Leave it to me! In return, pick one for me too, Kanan. Ah, let’s keep it under 3000 yen, and you can also choose sailor uniforms!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>So it’s a contest? Then I won’t lose-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
